meanings.definition: Not able to be distinguished or recognized as different.
meanings.sent1: The twins looked so similar that they were indistinguishable from each other.
meanings.sent2: The two paintings were so alike that they were indistinguishable to the untrained eye.
meanings.sent3: The indistinguishable keys on the keychain caused confusion when trying to unlock the door.
meanings.sent4: The blend of colors in the painting created an indistinguishable harmony that mesmerized viewers.
meanings.sent5: The indistinguishable voices in the choir blended together to create a beautiful sound.

meanings.sent1: The two flavors were so similar that they were indistinguishable in the blind taste test.
meanings.sent2: The identical twins were indistinguishable to most people, even their own parents.
meanings.sent3: The indistinguishable footprints in the sand puzzled the detective trying to solve the case.
meanings.sent4: The indistinguishable stars in the night sky seemed to twinkle in unison.
meanings.sent5: The indistinguishable patterns on the butterfly wings made it hard to identify the species.
